title: Rules of Summer
description: A multi-user VR game where you catch creatures together, to learn about the importance of friendship.
author: Sean Tan
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=btLgP83sFvs

content.caption: This is the entrance of the “Summer Memories” room.
User enter the room. This is the first perspective from the entrance. User can see there are two parts in the room — the interactive wall part and VR game area.
When the user walks through the interactive wall, the fireflies will glow and appear to fly out for a short stay.
When the user touches the interactive wall, the surrounding plants will slowly glow and appear for a while.
The plants slowly glow and show. This is when all the insects and plants on the interactive wall appear.
This is the first interface for the user to put on the VR device and enter the VR game.
The game's prompt language allows users to clearly understand the content of the game.
This is the perspective of looking at friends in the game.
